returns.isRegistered_: True if the adapter is registered

params._adapters: Addresses of adapters to be deregistered

getOwner().details: Ownership is deferred to the owner of the FundDeployer contract

returns.registeredAdaptersArray_: A list of all registered integration adapters

returns.isAuthUser_: True if the account is an authorized user or the fund owner

params._actionId: An ID representing the desired action
params._callArgs: The encoded args for the action
params._caller: The user who called for this action

params._adapters: Addresses of adapters to be registered

setConfigForFund(bytes).details: Unimplemented by default, may be overridden.

activateForFund(bool).notice: Activates the extension by storing the VaultProxy

adapterIsRegistered(address).notice: Checks if an integration adapter is registered

addAuthUserForFund(address,address).notice: Authorizes a user to act on behalf of a fund via the IntegrationManager

deactivateForFund().notice: Deactivate the extension by destroying storage

deregisterAdapters(address[]).notice: Remove integration adapters from the list of registered adapters

getOwner().notice: Gets the owner of this contract

getVaultProxyForFund(address).notice: Gets the verified VaultProxy for a given ComptrollerProxy

isAuthUserForFund(address,address).notice: Checks whether an account is an authorized IntegrationManager user for a given fund

receiveCallFromComptroller(address,uint2.notice: Receives a dispatched `callOnExtension` from a fund's ComptrollerProxy

registerAdapters(address[]).notice: Add integration adapters to the list of registered adapters

removeAuthUserForFund(address,address).notice: Removes an authorized user from the IntegrationManager for the given fund

setConfigForFund(bytes).notice: Allows extension to run logic during fund configuration

userdoc.notice: Extension to handle DeFi integration actions for funds
